name: Junior Frontend Developer
description:
HashEx vision is to become the #1 DeFi Intelligence and Security Provider.

We believe that only relevant, factual data and top security standards can make the DeFi market a safe financial space. If you are passionate about our common goal, we are always looking for talented individuals with knowledge, experience, and a desire to learn.

What we're looking for

Now we are looking for a Junior Frontend Developer who is passionate about building high quality web applications. You’ll work in a team of experienced front-end developers and designers to deliver new features on our decentralized products, improve our website and multiple landing pages.

Responsibilities:

  • Coding in HTML and CSS to build websites and web applications based on design mock-ups in Figma
  • Creating websites in Tilda
  • Supporting and making changes to existing application
  • Creating banners, logo’s, presentations and other elements of graphic design

Qualifications:

  • Minimum 1 years of professional experience
  • Advanced knowledge in HTML, CSS
  • Experience in responsive and mobile design
  • Basic understanding of JavaScript and React
  • Experience with Git
  • Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that the application will adhere to them
  • Strong attention to detail and desire for quality

Preferred:

  • Experience in cryptocurrency, blockchain, Ethereum network, and DeFi

Benefits:

  • Fast-growing company and unique business challenges
  • International working environment in a team of people who are passionate about big goals
  • Great career opportunities in a developing company
  • Opportunity to develop both personally and professionally
  • Progressive salary and bonuses
  • Remote work and flexible hours (3-4 hours per day)
  • Annual corporate retreat
